sentences.sContent: Hell, why not buy all of Manhattan?
sentences.sContent_eng: Hell, why not buy all of Manhattan?
sentences.sCn: 见鬼，为什么不把曼哈顿全买下来？

sentences.sContent: Do you need your flat in Manhattan?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do you need your flat in Manhattan?
sentences.sCn: 你需要你在曼哈顿的公寓吗？

sentences.sContent: But before you can even pay the tuition, you have to get in. Competition for a spot at some of Manhattan's most coveted schools is fierce.
sentences.sContent_eng: But before you can even pay the tuition, you have to get in. Competition for a spot at some of Manhattan's most coveted schools is fierce.
sentences.sCn: 然而即使你能付得起学费，你必须要先入园才行。在曼哈顿区一些最抢手的学校里，争夺一个名额的竞争是非常激烈的。

phrases.pCn: 曼哈顿计划（第二次世界大战期间美国陆军自1942年起开发核武器计划的代号）
曼哈顿闹市区（纽约市中心商业地带）

trans.tranCn: 曼哈顿岛(美国纽约一区)
